00027 #  if defined(_REENTRANT)
00028 
00029 #    if defined(USE_NSPR_THREADS)
00030 #        include "sys/ConditionVarNSPR.h"
00031 namespace sys
00032 {
00033 typedef ConditionVarNSPR ConditionVar;
00034 }
00035 // If they explicitly want posix
00036 #    elif defined(__POSIX)
00037 #        include "sys/ConditionVarPosix.h"
00038 namespace sys
00039 {
00040 typedef ConditionVarPosix ConditionVar;
00041 }
00042 #    elif defined(WIN32)
00043 #        include "sys/ConditionVarWin32.h"
00044 namespace sys
00045 {
00046 typedef ConditionVarWin32 ConditionVar;
00047 }
00048 #    elif defined(__sun) && !defined(__POSIX)
00049 #        include "sys/ConditionVarSolaris.h"
00050 namespace sys
00051 {
00052 typedef ConditionVarSolaris ConditionVar;
00053 }
00054 #    elif defined(__sgi) && !defined(__POSIX)
00055 #        include "sys/ConditionVarIrix.h"
00056 namespace sys

00059 }
00060 #    else
00061 #        include "sys/ConditionVarPosix.h"
00062 namespace sys

00067
